message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $20,000 to start negotiations.
I really like the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I hoped for. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16,000 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider $14,000?
